Circular No. AS- 19/2005

Sub: Turnout and Physical Fitness of CISF personnel

It has been observed by the Hon'ble Union Home Minister
during a presentation that turnout and physical fitness of CISF
personnel needs to be enhanced to improve the cverall effect.
Personnel posted in airports, VIP Security and GBS are always in
the public eye.

It is therefore directed that all CISF ASG Unit Commanders,
VIP Security and GBS Commanders shall ensure that their
personne! should be physically fit, smartly dressed up and well
groomed. They should also be counselled and educated that smart
turnout would not only project the positive image of the Force but
also groom their personality and thereby enhance their morale and
confidence. To motivate their men to be smartly dressed and well
groomed, Unit Commanders may suitably reward the personnel for
best turnout from time to time. Personal interest of the Unit
Commander will make all the difference in this regard.

In short, the turnout and physique of CISF personnel is
noticed at the first glance not only by top echelons of the country
but also by the foreign tourist visiting India and will go a long way
in raising the impression of the Force in the minds of the people.

Unit Commanders will therefore ensure that their men are
smartly turned out on duty. Smartest of them should be put on duty
‘on vantage points where they are likely to be most visible.
2:
Please acknowledge the receipt and ensure strict

compliance.
